solution_line_template: Each of Gina's account has ${betty_balance} / {gina_account_denominator} accounts = $<<{betty_balance}/{gina_account_denominator}={gina_account_balance}>>{gina_account_balance}/account
Her combined account balance is therefore ${gina_account_balance} + ${gina_account_balance} = $<<{gina_account_balance}+{gina_account_balance}={combined_gina_balance}>>{combined_gina_balance}
